title: Backup
content:
To prevent data loss, it's recommended to back up your data on the servers onto secure media often. This is also helpful for disaster recovery and business continuity.

After installing OO Workflow Designer, make sure to back up the designer\var\security folder and the designer\conf\database.properties file.

Some data on the database schema are encrypted and the keys for decryption are stored locally on the OO Workflow Designer server. If these system files become corrupted or deleted, the schema will be useless, because there will be no way to decrypt the data.

The keys are encrypted, so it's important to include them in the backup. The keys are located in the security folder.
